name: typescript-enhancements
description: TypeScript-specific analysis enhancements for file summaries
additionalInstructions: Distinguish between interfaces, types, and classes (note which is which)
For interfaces: list all properties, methods, and whether they extend other interfaces
For types: note if they are union types, intersection types, or mapped types
Identify React hooks if present (useState, useEffect, useContext, etc.) with their purposes
Note whether exports are default or named (export default vs export { name })
Flag async/await usage and Promise return types
For React components: list props interface, state, hooks used, and component type (functional/class)
Identify decorators if using experimental decorators (@Injectable, @Component, etc.)
Note generic type parameters (<T>, <K extends keyof T>, etc.) and their constraints
For enums: list all values and note if they are string or numeric enums
